text: They're major Hollywood heavyweights with a romantic history. And it appears that Charlize Theron and Alexander Skarsgard have rekindled their relationship nearly six years after first dating, according to Life & Style. Charlize, 42, and Alexander, 41, are trying to keep things'private'but have reportedly been'flirting on set'of their new film, political comedy Flarsky.
